verses.name: Romans 3:11
verses.text: There is none that understandeth, there is none that seeketh after God.

verses.name: Romans 3:12
verses.text: They are all gone out of the way, they are together become unprofitable; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.

verses.name: Romans 3:13
verses.text: Their throat is an open sepulchre; with their tongues they have used deceit; the poison of asps is under their lips:

verses.name: Romans 3:14
verses.text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness:

verses.name: Romans 3:15
verses.text: Their feet are swift to shed blood:

verses.name: Romans 3:16
verses.text: Destruction and misery are in their ways:

verses.name: Romans 3:17
verses.text: And the way of peace have they not known:

verses.name: Romans 3:18
verses.text: There is no fear of God before their eyes.
